content.text: Doing well! I'm about to go off to college soon.
Oh, that's exciting! Where are you headed?
I'm going to a liberal school in Tennessee.
Oh, nice! I'm from New York.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to tinker and build things. I also like to cook ethnic foods and listen to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
That's cool! I like to cook ethnic foods too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I like to cook a lot of different things, but my favorite thing is probably pad thai.
Pad thai is delicious! I love the noodles and the peanut sauce.
Me too! I also like the tofu and the vegetables.
What's your favorite thing about New York?
I love the local shops. There are so many different places to go and find unique things.
That's awesome! I'm sure I'll be doing a lot of shopping there.
I'm sure you will! There are so many great stores.
You're going to have a great time
